TopicTitle: Game freezes but doesnt crash. No crash log created.

Articles.Content:
Hardware:

5930k

32gb Ram

970GTXsli

Fresh install wont last more than 10 minutes before freezing. The music will continue to play after the freeze. So far it hasnt actually crashed yet. There doesnt appear to be any crash log created. I tried 64 bit and it didnt freeze but after noticing the upgraded buildings bug im not sure I gave it enough time. If this happens in the VAB then its not a total lockup. Some buttons are still clickable and the flag is changeable on the craft. The center of mass button will still toggle the icon on the ship and the kerbals are still walking around the VAB floor. Windowed mode and changed graphics settings to minimum will also have the same issue. Totally lost on this one.

Hi jwilly246,

If you could please look at this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

It will tell you how to find the output_log.txt even if KSP doesn't crash. Also, it might be helpful to upload a dxdiag report (also in the thread above).

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1urnxmaykd3p3w9/output_log.txt?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/j026t3g8mw1a2mg/DxDiag.txt?dl=0

Sorry about that. I was so focused on the crash log i overlooked the output log file. Last portion is it mentioning a hang up while trying to autosave. Which sounds about right now that I think about it. Its installed into my default steam directory.
I installed your bug fix module mod and started a fresh save and so far the problem has yet to happen again.
